revision.text:
'''Unova''' is the fifth [[region]] in the Pokéclicker world. The Pokedex for this region contains 155 Pokémon from Victini to Genesect. [[File:Pokeclicker_Unova_Map.png|thumb|A Town Map of the Unova region]] ===List of Unova locations=== ====Towns and [[Shops]]==== {| class="wikitable" |- | [[Towns_%26_Cities#Unova_Cities_.26_Towns|Aspertia City]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Unova_Cities_.26_Towns|Floccessy Town]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Unova_Cities_.26_Towns|Virbank City]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Unova_Cities_.26_Towns|Castelia City]] |- | [[Towns_%26_Cities#Unova_Cities_.26_Towns|Nimbasa City]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Unova_Cities_.26_Towns|Driftveil City]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Unova_Cities_.26_Towns|Mistralton City]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Unova_Cities_.26_Towns|Lentimas Town]] |- | [[Towns_%26_Cities#Unova_Cities_.26_Towns|Undella Town]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Unova_Cities_.26_Towns|Lacunosa Town]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Unova_Cities_.26_Towns|Opelucid City]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Unova_Cities_.26_Towns|Humilau City]] |- | [[Towns_%26_Cities#Unova_Cities_.26_Towns|Pokemon League Unova]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Unova_Cities_.26_Towns|Black and White Park]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Unova_Cities_.26_Towns|Icirrus City]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Unova_Cities_.26_Towns|Nacrene City]] |- | [[Towns_%26_Cities#Unova_Cities_.26_Towns|Striaton City]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Unova_Cities_.26_Towns|Accumula Town]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Unova_Cities_.26_Towns|Nuvema Town]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Unova_Cities_.26_Towns|Anville Town]] |} ====Routes==== ''See [[Route Statistics]] for more in-depth info.'' {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !
